user_question: How can I make a dessert that combines chocolate, avocado, and chili?
final_answer: You can make a chocolate avocado mousse with a hint of chili. Blend ripe avocados with melted dark chocolate, a pinch of chili powder, and a sweetener of your choice. Chill before serving.
